mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( MEMBERID, MEMBERPWD, MEMBERNAME, MEMBEREMAIL, MEMBERPHONENUM , MEMBERRATING, MEMBERSIGNUPDATE, MEMBERBASEADDRESS, MEMBERINSTAGRAMID ) VALUES ( mem_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail} , #{memberPhoneNum}, 0, SYSDATE, #{memberBaseAddress}, #{memberInstagramId} )
